message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $85. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $87.50. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm glad we're getting closer. I can agree to $86 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand we're close, but I'm not quite ready to accept $86. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $88. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I'm willing to pay $87 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any higher than $88, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $88.50. This is my final offer.
